name: 9 Muses
description:
Long ago in ancient Macedonia, King Pierus issued a challenge to the 9 Muses of Greek legend, pitting his beloved 9 daughters against them in a contest of talent and knowledge. When the Muses emerged victorious, they punished the princesses by transforming them into magpies.

Now the Pierides seek to reverse their curse. Hunt down each of the 9 Muses and best them in aerial combat. Each defeat will bring the transformed princesses closer to regaining their human forms. Unlock all 9 of the Pierides, gaining new special abilities and growing stronger. Tackle the unique hazards and attacks that each Muse possesses.

9 Muses is a simple 2D action game. Fly around to gain speed while avoiding the boss' attacks. Hit the Muses in the head with your beak to deal damage.

WASD to move the magpie.

Space or Left Click to use special abilities

Arrow Keys to aim certain special abilities.

Note: This is a demo version of the game, starring the Muse of Tragedy, Melpomene. Press level select to start the game and use the arrows to scroll to Melpomene.
